column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I would say that just about every ramen shop in town gets the "too salty" critique. But in all honesty
column3: and we're never going to please every single customer every single time. But we promise to do our best
column6: if you're not 100% satisfied with your bowl
column7: just let your server know. We will do everything in our power to meet your satisfaction.
